about-me.description: A computer science student at Fasilkom, Universitas Indonesia. Who is eager to learn software development and try to develop an useful application. I am driven to be a software engineer.

-LEchHadq93Jr1CAlcmq.title: The Best Telegram Bot for Pusilkom, Advance Programming 2017/2018 term 2 Bonus Project

description: Major in Computer Science.
Actively, work as a part-time teaching assistant on various courses.

Coursework: Introduction to Digital System, Introduction to Computer Organization, Data Structures and Algorithm, Calculus, Linear Algebra, Statistics & Probability, Web Programming & Design, Advanced Programming, Database, Operating Systems, and Theory of Language & Automata.

Tutoring first semester students at Faculty of Computer Science University of Indonesia about foundation of programming, Java programming language, object-oriented programming, functional programming, algorithm, Git version control, Gradle build tool, jUnit, and Gitlab CI.
Create the tutorial guidance and mark students assignment in a group of fifteen students.
-LEZqBu99LFbQ94YhC15.title: Teaching Assistant: Foundation of Programming 2

description: Working in base-dashboard project.
Rebuild Jojonomic Pro web-based application using Vue.js.
Create modular and reusable components used on all Jojonomic products.

In the base-dashboard project, the components I made consist of side-bar, data table, floating prompt, multi-currency, summary block, notification screen, breadcrumb, progress-screen, single-file input, and multi-file input.
-LEZqnhP1FykYtjNlua5.title: Front End Developer Internship

description: Role: Owner
As a solo developer and designer, I fully built this app from scratch.
A portfolio website fully built using Vue Js and designed to be responsive, maintainable and modular.
This app has deployed to Heroku.
Use Firebase as the backend, fetch the newest data automatically.
Use Express js to serve dist JavaScript codes.
Use Cloudflare to manage app's domain and improve web performance-security.
A side weekend project to improve my web development skills.
Still in the development stage.
-LFAdQv7N4cjLCEckW4A.name: arga.ga - Arga Ghulam Ahmad's Personal Portofolio

description: Role: Master

We developed SION using Flask Web Microframework to complete our database group assignment. We deployed it to kawung.cs.ui.ac.id and you can access this system through http://152.118.25.3:8101 if you are on Universitas Indonesia internet network. We use PostgreSQL as our database management system, and query data using raw SQL.
In this project, I prepare the development environment, developed authentication & register feature, and deploy the application to the server.
-LFAhd1hidKoZeXHceO_.name: SION - Sistem Informasi Organisasi Nirlaba

description: Role: Team Leader

We developed 'Konekin Enterprise' web app using the Django web framework with Test Driven Development disciplines to complete our second web design and development tasks. We tested the code and deployed it to Heroku using Gitlab CI / CD.

In this project, I developed login and company profile page feature. Both features use Linkedin API to get user's data. I also set up Django environment, set up Gitlab CI/CD, set up 'Konekin Enterprise' Gitlab repository, and set up 'Konekin Enterprise' Heroku application.
-LFAjtbkZ6M7xGxl33Zb.name: Konekin Enterprise

description: Role: Team Leader

We developed 'Konekin' web app using the Django web framework with Test Driven Development disciplines to complete our first web design and development tasks. We tested the code and deployed it to Heroku using Gitlab CI / CD.

In this project, I develop dashboard feature. I also set up Django environment, create whole web app models, set up Gitlab CI/CD, set up 'Konekin' Gitlab repository, and set up 'Konekin' Heroku application.
-LFAkNVgbx_qMfNwCER4.name: Konekin
